features: [🧹GENTLE YET POTENT CLEANSING OIL🧹] Effective in eliminating makeup residue, blackheads and sebum, whilst preventing pore congestion. Essential step for double cleansing, with glowy glass skin results.
[🌿MILD INGREDIENTS ONLY🌿] Formulated with Heartleaf extract for soothing effects on the skin
[🧪FOR ALL SKIN TYPES🧪] Hypoallergenic & Non-Irritation Test completed, making it suitable for all skin types and especially Sensitive, Acne-Prone Skin.
[👀 GENTLE ON THE EYES👀] No eye stinging experiences when used around eyes, Eye Irritation Test (Cruelty Free HET-CAM Test) completedion test completed

[🤔HOW TO DOUBLE CLEANSE🤔] ① Apply the cleansing oil to dry skin and gently massage for 1-2 minutes. ② Emulsify with water to effectively remove sebum. ③ Wash off all oil residues by using a water based cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite cleaning oil!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been trying to find a good cleansing oil for a while now and could never find one I liked until now.- it so gentle! It does such a great job of cleansing areas like around the eye and doesn’t have a negative effect on my sensitive skin.- it melt waterproof makeup so quickly! Other products you have to use so much to get the smallest result.- a little goes a long way. I use about 1-2 pumps every morning and night and it’s more than enough- does a great job at cleansing the pores. I have noticed a huge difference in my pores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this!! I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cleanser to help the clogged pores on my nose. I was really worried that I would break out but it truly works and is for sensitive skin. After using it for a month, my nose feels and looks cleaner than ever. I double-cleanse and use this every night. Not only does it help remove dirt and excess oils from my face but it also acts as a makeup cleanser as well. To double-cleanse I use a water-based cleanser after and my skin feels so fresh. I 100% recommend especially if you want to begin double-cleansing!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research into this before buying. I have sensitive acne prone combo skin and it has been fine for my skin thus far. The scent is very faint which I like. It's watery compared to a cleansing balm or castor oil that I was using beforehand. Price wise it's good, I thought it would have been thicker but its a bigger bottle at a good price for what it is. I haven't seen any dramatic differences with using it but I see no irritation nor breakouts from it which is a win in my book! If you're looking to get for the first step of double cleansing I reccomend it, as I find it almost doesn't feel fully gone after washing alone. I feel better going in with another cleanser to follow after however, it took off my makeup very well. I put it to the test and used elf cleansing balm on one side and the oil on the other of my face and it seemed to work just as good without irritating my eyes as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did did a upward circular motion for about 20 seconds on each part of my dry face and when I tell you all the gunk and dirt in my pores came out and I could see it build up on my fingers and my face I mean it. It removed every single fiber of dirt on my face and it removed all my makeup so easily and quickly it got rid of my water proof makeup aswell so easily. I do not recommend it for sensitive skin but if your like me and don’t have sensitive skin get this item get it! It will remove and erase all your sebaceous filaments in seconds! My skin is so clear and smooth and soft it’s amazing I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't live without it!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil! As someone who struggles with blackheads and daily makeup use, this product has been a game changer for my skin. First of all, the packaging is beautiful and the pump dispenser makes it easy to use and mess-free. The oil itself has a light and refreshing scent, and a little goes a long way. I was amazed at how easily this cleansing oil removed all of my makeup, including stubborn waterproof mascara. It left my skin feeling incredibly clean and nourished, without any greasy residue. But what truly sets this product apart is its ability to control pores and blackheads. After using it for just a few days, I noticed a significant improvement in the appearance of my pores and a reduction in blackheads. My skin feels smoother and looks clearer than ever before. I also appreciate that this cleanser is made with natural ingredients, including heartleaf extract which has anti-inflammatory properties. It's gentle on my skin and doesn't cause any irritation or redness.Overall, I highly recommend the Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil to anyone looking for a high-quality Korean facial cleanser. It truly delivers on its promises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pores be gone!
reviews.reviewText: Although it doesnt shrink the size of your pores it really removes all the sebum so the pores still look smaller. If you have really bad black heads it wont remove them all the time but i do notice5-10 little black points on my hands when im done so with consistency i believe eventually i will be blackhead free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the hype, so far!
reviews.reviewText: After one use of this, I can say it worked! I’ve been using it for about three days, morning and nights, and I really do like this cleanser. Within one use, I could FEEL the sebum and dirt coming off! It felt like there was exfoliating beads in it.. but it was just all the dirt! I saw it ALL over my instagram reels, and I have very bad issues with blackhead/sebum in my t-zone area. I will update with images later on once I’ve used it more.With a combo of retinol at night and vitamin c in the day time, this leaves my skin smooth and glossy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because of the pictures!! I want my little sebaceus filaments gone too! Texture of this product is very milky/greasy/runny. Be careful with the pump because it will feel hard to push down but then BAM a big squirt of this all over the sink/counter. Anyway, it gets the job done. Does not burn my skin. I used the same brand facial cleanser after, and I feel very clean. The scent isn't wonderful but not my favorite either. Hard to describe. I will say it does not linger though. 4 stars. Fair price and definitely removes all makeup. Packaging could use some work.

I recently started using this face cleansing oil and I must say, it has completely transformed my skincare routine. This product provides a deep and thorough cleanse, leaving my skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and incredibly clean.First and foremost, the texture of this face cleansing oil is luxurious. It has a lightweight and silky-smooth consistency that glides effortlessly across the skin. The oil effectively removes makeup, dirt, and impurities without stripping away the skin's natural moisture.One of the standout features of this cleansing oil is its ability to dissolve even the most stubborn makeup. It effortlessly melts away waterproof mascara, long-lasting foundation, and heavy eye makeup, making the cleansing process quick and easy. I no longer have to struggle with multiple products or harsh rubbing to remove my makeup.Furthermore, this face cleansing oil is incredibly gentle on the skin. It does not cause any irritation or dryness, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The formula is free from harsh chemicals and fragrances, ensuring a soothing and comfortable cleansing experience.Additionally, this cleansing oil leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. It effectively removes impurities and unclogs pores, resulting in a clearer complexion. Even after rinsing off the oil, my skin feels moisturized and supple, without any greasy residue.Moreover, the fragrance of this cleansing oil is subtle and pleasant. It adds a touch of relaxation to my skincare routine without being overpowering or irritating. The scent is light and refreshing, enhancing the overall experience of using this product.Another great feature of this face cleansing oil is its versatility. It can be used as a standalone cleanser or as part of a double cleansing routine. The oil effortlessly emulsifies upon contact with water, turning into a milky consistency that rinses away easily, leaving no residue behind.Overall, I highly recommend this face cleansing oil. It provides a luxurious and effective cleansing experience, removing makeup and impurities while leaving the skin feeling nourished and refreshed.
So far soo good 👍 It really removes all the dirts from my face.
This packaging honestly looks like it’s an Anua bottle that’s been repackaged and filled with something else. No brand would have such uneven packaging

Been seeing this product on skin care tiktok lots lately, and i have been trying to revamp my routine bc my skin has been so not nice lately (i live in canada and its dryyyyyy af and cold during winter). ive always had really large pores that i NOTICED as well. This product, doing a double cleanse with my regular face wash that ive been using (tatcha), followed by serums/moisturizer as usual.....let me tell you it TRANSFORMED my skin. Ive only been using it for a week now, and my skin is so soft, blackheads GONE, pores soooo much smaller, really giving that 'glass skin' look that we strive for. i did see SOME reviews saying it worked great at first for ppl then their skin went to shambles, so i really hope that aint the case here bc im in love with the current results. TRY IT PEOPLE
Makes my skin clean and soft.
